 18 /**
 19  * The "Manager" acts as a container for all widgets. 
 20  *
 21  * <p> It stores solr configuration and selection and delegates calls to the widgets.
 22  *     All public calls should be performed on the manager object. </p>
 23  * <p> There has to be exactly one instance called "solrjsManager" present </p> 
 24  *     
 25  *
 26  * @example
 27  *  var solrjsManager;
 28  *   $sj(document).ready(function(){
 29  *       solrjsManager = new $sj.solrjs.Manager(
 30  *         { solrUrl:"http://localhost:8983/solr/select", 
 31  *           resourcesBase: "../../src/resources" });
 32  *   });
 33  *
 34  * @param properties A map of fields to set. Refer to the list of non-private fields.
 35  * @class Manager
 36  */
 37 jQuery.solrjs.Manager = jQuery.solrjs.createClass (null,  /** @lends jQuery.solrjs.Manager.prototype */ {
 38 
 39   /** 
 40    * The absolute url to the solr instance
 41    * @field 
 42    * @default http://localhost:8983/solr/select/
 43    * @public
 44    */
 45    solrUrl : "http://localhost:8983/solr/select/",
 46    
 47   /** 
 48    * A path (absolute or relative) to the base directory of solrjs resources (css, imgs,..)
 49    * @field 
 50    * @public
 51    */
 52    resourcesBase : "",
 53 
 54   /** 
 55    * A constant representing "all documents"
 56    * @field 
 57    * @private 
 58    */
 59   QUERY_ALL : "*:*",  
 60   
 61   /** 
 62    * A collection of all registered widgets. For internal use only. 
 63    * @field 
 64    * @private 
 65    */
 66   widgets : [],
 67   
 68   /** 
 69    * A collection of the currently selected QueryItems. For internal use only. 
 70    * @field 
 71    * @private 
 72    */
 73   queryItems : [],
 74   
 75   /** 
 76    * A collection of the attached selection views. 
 77    * @field 
 78    * @private 
 79    */
 80   selectionViews : [],
 81 
 82  /** 
 83    * Adds a widget to this manager. 
 84    * @param {jQuery.solrjs.AbstractWidget} widget An instance of AbstractWidget. 
 85    */
 86   addWidget : function(widget) { 
 87 		widget.manager = this;
 88  	  this.widgets[widget.id] = widget;
 89  	  widget.afterAdditionToManager();
 90 	},
 91 	
 92  /** 
 93    * Adds a selection view to this manager. 
 94    * @param {jQuery.solrjs.AbstractSelectionView} widget An instance of AbstractSelectionView. 
 95    */
 96   addSelectionView : function(view) { 
 97     view.manager = this;
 98     this.selectionViews[view.id] = view;
 99   },
100 
101   /** 
102    * Adds the given items to the current selection.
103    * @param widgetId The widgetId of where these items were selected. 
104    * @param items A list of newly selected items. 
105    */
106 	selectItems: function(widgetId, items){
107   	this.widgets[widgetId].select(items);
108   	var querySizeBefore = this.queryItems.length;
109   	for (var i = 0; i < items.length; ++i) {
110       if (!this.containsItem(items[i])) {
111         this.queryItems.push(items[i]);
112       }
113     }
114     if (querySizeBefore < this.queryItems.length) {
115       this.doRequest(0);
116     }
117   },
118   
119   /** 
120    * Removes the given items from the current selection.
121    * @param widgetId The widgetId of where these items were deselected. 
122    */  
123   deselectItems: function(widgetId){
124   	var widget = this.widgets[widgetId];
125   	for (var i = 0; i < widget.selectedItems.length; i++) {
126       for (var j = 0; j < this.queryItems.length; j++) {
127         if (this.queryItems[j].toSolrQuery() ==  widget.selectedItems[i].toSolrQuery()) {
128           this.queryItems.splice(j, 1);
129         }   
130       }
131     }     
132   	widget.deselect();
133   	this.doRequest(0);
134   },
135   
136   /** 
137    * Removes the given item from the current selection, regardless of widgets.
138    * @param widgetId The widgetId of where these items were deselected. 
139    */  
140   deselectItem: function(solrQuery){
141     for (var j = 0; j < this.queryItems.length; j++) {
142       var s = this.queryItems[j].toSolrQuery();
143       if (s ==  solrQuery) {
144         this.queryItems.splice(j, 1);
145       }   
146     }
147     this.doRequest(0);
148   },
149     
150   /** 
151    * Checks if the given item is available in the current selection.
152    * @param {jQuery.solrjs.QueryItem} item The item to check.
153    */  
154   containsItem: function(item){
155   	for (var i = 0; i < this.queryItems.length; ++i) {
156   		if (this.queryItems[i].toSolrQuery() == item.toSolrQuery()) {
157   			return true;
158   		}		
159   	}
160   	return false;
161   },
162   
163   /** 
164    * Creates a query out of the current selection and calls all bound widgets to
165    * request their data from the server.
166    * @param start The solr start offset parameter (mostly for result widgets).
167    * @param resultsOnly Indicates that only the page changed and only result widgets should repaint).
168    */ 
169   doRequest : function(start, resultsOnly) { 
170 		var query = "";
171     	
172   	if (this.queryItems.length == 0) {
173   		query = this.QUERY_ALL;
174   	} else {
175   		for (var i = 0; i < this.queryItems.length; ++i) {
176   			query += this.queryItems[i].toSolrQuery();
177   			if (i < this.queryItems.length -1) {
178   				query += " AND ";
179   			}
180   		}
181   	}
182 
183 	  for (var id in this.widgets) {
184 	  	this.widgets[id].doRequest(query, start, resultsOnly);
185 	  }
186 	  
187 	  for (var id in this.selectionViews) {
188       this.selectionViews[id].displaySelection(this.queryItems);
189     }
190 	}, 
191 
192   /** 
193    * Sets the current selection to *:* and requests all docs.
194    */ 
195 	doRequestAll: function() {
196     this.queryItems=[];
197     this.doRequest(0);   
198   },
199   
200   clearSelection: function() {
201     this.queryItems=[];
202   },
203   
204   /** 
205    * Helper method that returns an ajax-loading.gif inside a div.
206    */ 
207   getLoadingDiv : function() {
208     var div = jQuery("<div/>");
209     jQuery("<img/>").attr("src", this.resourcesBase + "/img/ajax-loader.gif" ).appendTo(div);
210     return div;
211   }
212 });
213
